TopicTitle: PartModule.OnInitialized not being called on first part

Articles.Content: I'm not sure where to go to report this, but as I'm developing a mod I noticed something that's almost certainly a smallish bug in KSP itself.  PartModule.OnInitialize() gets called every time you create a part in the editor...  Except for the first part in the vessel.  (So if you have a modded part that relies on OnInitialize, that part won't work right if it's the first part on a vessel.)
